sources.title: The Houston Story (1956) Gene Barry, Barbara Hale, Edward Arnold
sources.description: The Houston Story is a 1956 American crime FILM NOlR directed by William Castle and starring Gene Barry, Barbara Hale and Edward Arnold.   You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia and there are also good reviews of the movie from the movie blogs Bottom of the Barrel and  D for Doom .

metadata.Plot: In Houston, a man working as an oil driller comes up with a scheme for stealing millions of dollars worth of oil from the fields. He insinuates himself with a local mobster in order to get financing for his scheme.
metadata.Actors: Gene Barry, Barbara Hale, Edward Arnold
